short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks availability in San Francisco public libraries while browsing Amazon.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be notified when the current item you're browsing on Amazon.com is available at the public library. If it's available or will be available soon, a link will be inserted into the Amazon page that you can click to navigate to the appropriate library web page.

Currently only works for the San Francisco Public Library. More libraries may be added in the future.
